alert.note: Alert for Eastern Panhandle, Crescent Lake NWR; Frenchman Basin (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued July 17 at 4:52PM CDT until July 18 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY AND INTENSE HEAT HEADING FOR PARTS OF WESTERN NEBRASKA MONDAY... .Humidity near or below 15 percent and strong southwest winds combined with temperatures above 100 degrees will produce critical fire weather conditions across parts of western Nebraska Monday. Isolated thunderstorms capable of dry lightning are possible also. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE EASTERN PANHANDLE/CRESCENT LAKE NWR-FRENCHMAN BASIN... * Affected Area...In NEZ204...Fire Weather Zone 204 Eastern Panhandle/Crescent Lake NWR. In NEZ210...Fire Weather Zone 210 Frenchman Basin. * Winds...Southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 14 percent. * Lightning...Isolated thunderstorms capable of dry lightning may develop. * Impacts...Any fire starts will be difficult or impossible to contain.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Panhandle, Crescent Lake NWR; Frenchman Basin
